categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic ranks

nodes.text: Procurement officer was a role within the Alliance to Restore the Republic. They were responsible for procuring material and supplies for the Alliance. A young procurement officer once paid a exorbitant amount for a VR-10 Cuirilla-Rayl Xylines-class spacetug that the seller, Yearo Seville, claimed was from an Imperial shipyard and had vital information in its memory.
